name: Marabou
run: vehicle compile -s spec.vcl -t MarabouQueries -o Marabou.queries --network g:fake.onnx -e p2

name: Agda
run: vehicle compile -s spec.vcl -t Agda -o Agda.agda --network f:NO_FILE --network g:NO_FILE -e p2

name: LossFunction
run: vehicle compile -s spec.vcl -t LossFunction -o LossFunction.json --network f:NO_FILE --network g:NO_FILE
